markdownRemark.html: Situated in the foothills of the Sierra de la Almijara mountain range. If you happen to be around Velez, unless you like to drive miles and miles, this is the only course. But it's a jewel. The course is flat, fairly easy except for the greens which are large, on average 700 square metres with slopes and swales. The fairways are very forgiving, 80 to 90 metres wide and without climbs or drops. The Club house is not too expensive, with a great terrace overlooking the 17th and 18th fairways/greens.

frontmatter.title: Baviera Golf
frontmatter.description: Baviera Golf - Situated in the foothills of the Sierra de la Almijara mountain range. If you happen to be around Velez, unless you like to drive miles and miles, this is the only course. But it's a jewel. The course is flat, fairly easy except for the greens which are large, on average 700 square metres with slopes and swales. The fairways are very forgiving, 80 to 90 metres wide and without climbs or drops. The Club house is not too expensive, with a great terrace overlooking the 17th and 18th fairways/greens.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Baviera Golf, 29751 Caleta de Vélez (Málaga), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 67.00 euro, Highest green fee weekends 67.00 euro
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
